Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator

Class EncryptedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator.EncryptedMessage
  • public class EncryptedMessage
extends Object
    This class represents an encrypted message in form of a map. Every entry consists of an index to indicate the otp-chunk that has been used for encryption as well as the resulting byte array for he corresponding chunk.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getPrefix​(int chunkId, int chunkPadding)
      Helper method that creates a quasi unique prefix telling the hash of one time pad used and intern chunk used for encryption.
      String serializeToHex()
      Utils method that serializes an encrypted to a printable string, conaining only ASCII characters.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        public String getPrefix​(int chunkId,
                        int chunkPadding)
        Helper method that creates a quasi unique prefix telling the hash of one time pad used and intern chunk used for encryption.
        Parameters:
        chunkId - as the number of the chunk used for encryption.
        chunkPadding - as the target length for padding the number with leading zeroes.
        Returns:
        a prefix string that can concatenated with representation of an encrypted message chop.

      • serializeToHex

        public String serializeToHex()
        Utils method that serializes an encrypted to a printable string, conaining only ASCII characters. The outcome can be safely transmitted over insecure channels.
        Returns:
        ascii serialized version of encrypted message.
